tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ingredients (
    ingredient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ingredient_name VARCHAR(100),
    country_of_origin VARCHAR(50),
    quantity DECIMAL,
    unit_of_measurement VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE recipes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  cuisine_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  preparation_time INT NOT NULL,
  ingredient_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ingredients (id INT, name VARCHAR(255), origin_country VARCHAR(100), quantity INT, price DECIMAL) 

CREATE TABLE recipes (id INT, name VARCHAR(255), cuisine_type VARCHAR(100), difficulty_level VARCHAR(50))

CREATE TABLE suppliers (id INT, name VARCHAR(255), contact_person VARCHAR(100), address VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(15))

CREATE TABLE ingredient_inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ingredient_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    quantity DECIMAL,
    purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ingredients (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name STRING,
  quantity INT,
  unit STRING,
  country_of_origin STRING
);

CREATE TABLE recipes (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name STRING,
  description STRING,
  instructions STRING,
  cuisine STRING
);

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name STRING,
  contact_person STRING,
  email STRING,
  country STRING
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
  ingredient_id UUID REFERENCES ingredients(id),
  supplier_id UUID REFERENCES suppliers(id),
  price FLOAT,
  quantity INT,
  expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_id UUID REFERENCES suppliers(id),
  total_cost FLOAT,
  status STRING,
  delivery_date DATE
);
